title: Truss Powers Up Energy Plan
itunes:title: Truss Powers Up Energy Plan
description:
Liz Truss unveils details of her plan to tackle soaring energy prices, with massive government intervention to keep average household bills at £2,500, versus a planned jump to £3,548 in October. Bloomberg's energy reporter Will Mathis joins Stephen Carroll and Caroline Hepker to discuss the details. Also in the show, we hear from energy economist Caspian Conran from Baringa Partners about EU plans to cap prices, plus Kelly Beaver from Ipsos give us the latest polling on public perceptions of the new Prime Minister. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
